article: As we all know " The hand that rocks the cradle rules the world." and "  _  every successful man there is a woman." Both these  _  mean the same things. Men rule the  _  , but their wives rule them. Chinese people and other foreigners often say,  _  of the American women like making their husbands and sons successful, but some of them want  _  for themselves. They want good  _  . When they work they want to  _  better paid. They want to be as  _  as men. In the 1960s, the American women's liberation  _  was started by women who don't want to  _  behind successful men. They want to stand beside them, with the same  _  for success. They don't want to be told that certain jobs or  _  are closed to them. They refused to work side by side with men who do the  _  work for higher pay. In America, a liberation woman must be  _  of being a woman and have confidence in herself. If somebody says to her, " You have come a long  _  , baby", she will  _  and answer, "Not nearly as  _  as I am going to go, baby." On the other hand , this movement is quite  _  and many American women do not agree.  _  it has already made some important  _  in women's lives.
